response.overview: The central theme of the project is the trip to Stockholm that Grazia Deledda made in December 1927 to collect the Nobel Prize for Literature, awarded to her in 1926. During the long and nerve-racking journey, accompanied by her husband, Grazia experiences a series of flashbacks that retrace some fundamental moments of her existence, such as one of the first "encounters" with snow or the death of her sister.
response.title: Viaggio a Stoccolma
